Name: Beat 'Em Up
About the game: Beat 'Em Up - game is a complete package of boxing and karate. The whole game is designed in a story mode that you will Have to fight against the gangsters of city by applying your boxing and karate skills. This karate game is advanced type of fighting games. Beat 'Em Up is in wait for you. Amazing The amazing classical hard fighter and action game. ✔ Realistic street fighting sound. ✔ One touch Road kill gameplay controls. ✔ Multiple levels and scenarios in this adventure games. ✔ Experience street fighting in a relaxing action game. Available in Xbox, Windows 10 Store.
